name: Astro Finder
description:
Our small game about even smaller planets.  Your goal is to find the best little planet that you cal live on. 

Traveling with your handy   mining tool and upgrading your   ship named  Amanda as well as  your telescope  with     exotic materials from   all  edges    of space  . To find your best planet.  

But the jurney won't   be   easy. You   will   encounter several   types of   planets   which  have uniuqe   threats.
